Class GradientButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.AbstractButton
            • javax.swing.JButton
              • GradientButton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants 

    public class GradientButton
extends javax.swing.JButton
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener
    An implementation of a "push" button which support gradient background with two color. It extends JButton. So we can use all the feature of JButton. It has a method named setGradient(Color color1, Color color2) by which we can set the colors of the gradient background. And also setGradient(Color color1, Color color2, int align) which allows us to set the alignment of these colors.
    Author:
    Mashuk
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • TOP_TO_BOTTOM

        public static final int TOP_TO_BOTTOM
        This allows to set colors alignment as color1 start from top and color2 start from bottom. we can use it as a value of parameter like as: GradientButton.TOP_LEFT_TO_BOTTOM_RIGHT which returns a int value 0.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LEFT_TO_RIGHT

        public static final int LEFT_TO_RIGHT
        This allows to set colors alignment as color1 start from left and color2 start from right. we can use it as a value of parameter like as: GradientButton.TOP_LEFT_TO_BOTTOM_RIGHT which returns a int value 1.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TOP_LEFT_TO_BOTTOM_RIGHT

        public static final int TOP_LEFT_TO_BOTTOM_RIGHT
        This allows to set colors alignment as color1 start from top-left corner and color2 start from bottom-right corner. we can use it as a value of parameter like as: GradientButton.TOP_LEFT_TO_BOTTOM_RIGHT which returns a int value 2.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public static final int BOTTOM_LEFT_TO_TOP_RIGHT
        This allows to set colors alignment as color1 start from bottom-left corner and color2 start from top-right corner. we can use it as a value of parameter like as: GradientButton.TOP_LEFT_TO_BOTTOM_RIGHT which returns a int value 3.

      • GradientButton

        public GradientButton(java.awt.Color color1,
              java.awt.Color color2,
              int align)
        Creates a Gradientbutton with specific gradient colors and alignment.
        Parameters:
        color1 - First color of the gradient.
        color2 - Second color of the gradient.
        align - Determine the position of the colors. Here has four options. Such as TOP_TO_BOTTOM which is default, LEFT_TO_RIGHT, TOP_LEFT_TO_BOTTOM_RIGHT, BOTTOM_LEFT_TO_TOP_RIGHT.

      • GradientButton

        public GradientButton(java.awt.Color color1,
              java.awt.Color color2,
              int align,
              javax.swing.Icon icon)
        Creates a Gradientbutton with specific gradient colors ,alignment and initial icon.
        Parameters:
        color1 - First color of the gradient.
        color2 - Second color of the gradient.
        align - Determine the position of the colors. Here has four options. Such as TOP_TO_BOTTOM which is default, LEFT_TO_RIGHT, TOP_LEFT_TO_BOTTOM_RIGHT, BOTTOM_LEFT_TO_TOP_RIGHT.
        icon - the Icon image to display on the button

        Parameters:

        color2 - Second color of the gradient.

        icon - the Icon image to display on the button

    • Method Detail

      • setGradient

        public void setGradient(java.awt.Color color1,
               java.awt.Color color2)
        This method is use to set the colors of the gradient background.
        Parameters:
        color1 - First color of the gradient.
        color2 - Second color of the gradient.

      • setGradient

        public void setGradient(java.awt.Color color1,
               java.awt.Color color2,
               int align)
        This method is use to set the colors of the gradient background. It also allows to set the alignment of these colors.
        Parameters:
        color1 - First color of the gradient.
        color2 - Second color of the gradient.
        align - Determine the position of the colors. Here has four options. Such as TOP_TO_BOTTOM which is default, LEFT_TO_RIGHT, TOP_LEFT_TO_BOTTOM_RIGHT, BOTTOM_LEFT_TO_TOP_RIGHT.
